name: Memory (itch) (sbhiens)
description:
Title: Memory

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Puzzle, Hidden Object

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 10+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Help Addie find her missing objects on her task list!

Instructions: The objective is to find all the missing items on the list. Click on each one to improve your score and move on to the next level.

Game Design Team

Shelby Hiens – Game Designer
